tomes.name: Earth Tome
tomes.description: A Novice Friendly Tome For Minor Manipulation of Dirt and Stone. Note: Popular Amongst Fourth-Class Academy Scholars

tomes.name: Fire Tome
tomes.description: An Advanced Beginner's Perfect Tome For Flame Manipulation. Note: A Go To Tome For Mana Control Classes. Exceptionally High Skill Curve.

tomes.name: Holy Tome
tomes.description: A Competent Wizard's Go To Start On Deity Essence Extraction. Note: A Go To Tome For Protection And Rejuvenation Classes.

tomes.name: Void Tome
tomes.description: An Expert Archmage's First Textbook Over Astral Mana Starbinding and Manipulation. Note: Often Referenced and Studied By Academy Professors and Deans.

tomes.name: Dark Tome
tomes.description: An Unpredictable Tome For All Mages, But The Natural Next Step For Post-Grad WarPagers. Note: Hazardous And Potentially Fatal.

tomes.name: Summoning Tome
tomes.description: The Only Commercially Available Soulbinder For Freepagers! Note: Please Provide An Archcouncil Writ Signed In The Last 30 Days To Purchase.
